item.description:
Border Cafe
128 Middlesex Tpk
Burlington MA 01803
781-505-2500
http://www.bordercafe...

In an attempt to create a fun lively meetup environment to socialize and get to know one another better, we would like to invite Members to join us for some cheap eats and fun/laughter and fellowship on a regular basis. The idea is to have bi-monthly meetups for lunches/dinners/coffee houses etc..so we can chat and enjoy each other's company. We welcome and urge new members to join us. Casual setting, cheap eats and a fun time is guaranteed. The first Cheat Eats meetup is set for THIS Sunday. See details. Limit is 15 members. Please RSVP yes or no only.

Hostesses: Helen and Karen. Hopefully someone else in the group will want
to take a turn next time or make a suggestion for a good place to meet and continue with this theme.
item.why: This is a great new idea for Sunday afternoon socials where friends can gather to eat, chat and get to know each other better. Thanks to Karen and Helen for coming up with the idea and planning this event.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Cheap Eats Social
